tier.item: `Now (t he shop) has been taken over by someone else.'
`Now (t he shop) has been taken over by someone else.'
Now (t he shop) has been taken over by someone else.
a takki, a no komm jette
[`(lat. dicit, eum nondum venisse,) er sagt, dass er ein anderer noch nicht gekommen ist.']
`hei says that he/she/itk has not yet come'
(1) a. a takki, a no komm jette (Schumann 1783: 65)
[`(lat. dicit, eum nondum venisse,) er sagt, dass er ein anderer noch nicht gekommen ist.']
`hei says that he/she/itk has not yet come'
